Name: Dandy Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare lemon and orange zest for garnish.
Express lemon and orange zest twists over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This complex Manhattan variant is a well-balanced combo of spirit, liqueur and aromatic wine.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Dandy Cocktail contains 159 calories
